name: One Book to Rule them All

pages.text: When you first joined the game, in addition to this guidebook, you got an Eccentric Tome that contains all the books in the game! Right click with it in your hand to select the book. Shift left click in the air to reset it.$(br2)You can add new books by combining them with the Eccentric tome in a crafting grid. Try it with this book!
You lost it? Yeah, us too. Craft a new filled tome!
